title: Cogniscope: Modeling Social Media Interactions as Digital Biomarkers for Early Detection of Cognitive Decline
summary: Alzheimer's disease (AD) and its prodromal stage, Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI), are associated with subtle declines in memory, attention, and language that often go undetected until late in progression. Traditional diagnostic tools such as MRI and neuropsychological testing are invasive, costly, and poorly suited for population-scale monitoring.
